practicals.name: Implement SLP
practicals.aim: To implement a Single Layer Perceptron (SLP) model from scratch.
practicals.con: We successfully implemented a Single Layer Perceptron (SLP) model from scratch to tackle a basic classification problem.

practicals.name: XOR Using MLP
practicals.aim: To implement a Multi-Layer Perceptron (MLP) model to solve the XOR problem.
practicals.con: We successfully implemented a Multi-Layer Perceptron (MLP) model to solve the XOR problem, a classic example in machine learning that highlights the power of neural networks in capturing non-linear relationships.
